room Dear ladies and gentlemen, this morning the
People's Committee of Thu Duc City, Ho
Chi Minh City held an inauguration ceremony to
launch the administrative center  This is the city's
first public administrative center model that
performs the function of
receiving and returning results and handling
administrative procedures right from the first day of
operation. The center has received great
attention and feedback.  Positive feedback from the
people Thu Duc City Public Works Center
demonstrates the superiority of receiving,
processing and returning results instead of receiving,
transferring to processing units and then returning
results like the administrative model.
Normally, the center has a total of 37

Thu Duc City to ensure continuity of tasks
without interruption to implement
digital transformation, which is also very important.  It is important that in the
future, there must also be a study of the
work handling processes to make it reasonable,
clear and public.

This morning, the

Airbus has just announced.  two
new generation meteorological satellites with modern equipment.
These satellites help improve the
ability to observe weather phenomena
as well as weather forecasting.
Airbus DEF Space Group said
two newsmen named  made Off sj and b will
provide new data that will allow
meteorological engineers to refine their observations. The
satellite will help meteorologists make
much more precise observations
of atmospheric features from which they can  Predict
today's weather and over a longer period of time.
This helps scientists
visualize the evolution of the weather,
especially global warming
and pollution in the
two satellites' projected atmosphere.  meteorological objects each
weighing 4.3 tons will be launched into orbit
in December 2025 from the Kuru launcher in the
French province of Guangzhou. They will operate
at an altitude of 832 km to replace the
First Generation Makeup satellites.  which has been operating
in orbit since

This structure is estimated to date back to the second century

years. Cuba is famous for

However, these traditional dances

a project was born to teach
Each week, children from 4 years old and

seconds Dear ladies and gentlemen regarding the case of
three fishermen being attacked with gasoline bombs and
lead bullets on the waters of Ca Mau,
Kien Giang province general hospital reports the current
health of the victims.  The
leader of the border guard station at
Ha Tien International Border Gate also said that the unit had completed
the dossier and transferred the case to
Ca Mau province police to continue investigating and
clarifying according to the investigation of the border guard station at the
international border gate.  At around 2:00 p.m. on
November 8, three fishing vessels were fishing
in the coastal area of ​​Ca
Mau province when suddenly two other vehicles
approached the group of people on these two vessels
and used automatic weapons.  and gasoline bombs
attacked crew members on three fishing vessels,
injuring three people.
By 7:00 p.m. on November 9, two
seriously injured fishermen were transferred to
Kien Provincial General Hospital for treatment after
surgery.  The health of the two fishermen has gradually
stabilized. The fishermen hope that the
authorities will investigate and handle the matter so that people can feel
secure when going out to sea to make a
living, suspecting that his wife is having an affair. Nguyen Van Tam
resides in Phuc Yen city, Vinh province.
Phuc murdered his wife and hid her body
in the house even though he went to Ho Chi
Minh City to hide, but in the end the perpetrator
was far from the law. At noon on
November 10, people discovered a
stench emanating from the house.  house in Tan Loi village,
Tien Chau ward, Phuc Yen city. When
checking people, they discovered a
decomposing body in
a sack hidden under Duong.
Vinh Phuc province police investigated and identified the
victim.  Ms. Pham Ph Hang,
Nguyen Van Tam's wife, the police also quickly
confirmed that Tam was the perpetrator. The
investigation process showed that after recording the crime, Nguyen
Van Tam left the locality and took a plane
to Ho Chi Minh City to stay.  In the
legal district, the police of Vinh Phuc province
coordinated with the police of Ho Chi Minh City
to arrest eight people while he was hiding here.
Nguyen Van Tam confessed that he suspected his wife was having an
affair and had an argument with his wife, after which the
subject had sex.  strangled his wife to death and then
hid it in a
sack. Today, the police of Bien Hoa city,

buying, selling and  Illegally storing weapons

subject Phan Phu

Currently, Bien Hoa city police are also

today's incident.  A labor accident
occurred at a construction site in the

workers
around 12 noon when a group of
workers worked on the upper floors of a
hotel construction site in Hanoi.
Phan Thiet coastal urban area in Phu
Thuy ward when four workers were in an

broke causing the iron cage to fall freely. A
lucky worker jumped out of the iron cage in time to
escape the three people.  The rest fell from the iron
cage and died. Local police
were present to examine the scene until
early afternoon. The dead victims were
identified as Mr. Nguyen Van Xuan, 69 years old,
Bui Ngoc Lam, 62 years old, and Ms. Nguyen
Thi.  Thuan, 45 years old, resides in Ham Thuan Bac district, Binh

Initially, it was determined that the fire did
not cause any loss of life. Three houses were
almost completely burned down. Many
surrounding houses were affected. According to
records, the houses that burned were the
owners of one store's electrical system and audio speakers.  The
burned goods said that his goods
were damaged up to 10 billion VND. The
cause of the fire is being investigated and
clarified. Also today, a house on

VND.
More than 2 o'clock this morning, a fishing boat was
